scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=development && export PORT=3000 && node -r dotenv/config ./bin/www
scripts.devstart: export NODE_ENV=development && export PORT=3000 &&  nodemon -r dotenv/config ./bin/www
scripts.testWithoutDb: export NODE_ENV=test && export DB_CONN=none && mocha -r dotenv/config --watch --reporter spec --bail --check-leaks test/**/*.test.js
scripts.testCoverage: export NODE_ENV=test && npx nyc@latest mocha -r dotenv/config test/**/*.test.js
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test && mocha -r dotenv/config --watch --reporter spec --bail --check-leaks test/**/*.test.js
